name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TrueOps Amazon Seller Central Command Bar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Command bar for Amazon Seller Central

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TrueOps Amazon Seller Central Command Bar is a productivity extension designed to enhance Amazon Seller Central's navigation.

Key Features:

Deep Links: Automatically convert Seller Central URLs into deep links targeting the selected account and region.
Account and region switcher: Easily switch between Seller Central accounts and regions.
Seller Central Links: A searchable catalog of Seller Central links for quick access. 

How Deep Links Work:

The extension transforms Seller Central URLs into deep links. When you copy and share a Seller Central URL with someone, the extension ensures that the link opens the selected seller account and region. This leverages Seller Central's native features, requiring only the extension for deep link generation. Users with access to the target Seller Central account can easily open these links.

How to Open the Widget:

Press Command+Shift+k (macOS) or Alt+k (Windows) from any page to access the extension.
